hero.title: Haɗa Manoma Kai Tsaye da Masu Siyarwa
hero.subtitle: Babu dillalai. Babu asarar bayan girbi. Kawai farashi na gaskiya da kayan gona masu kyau.

features.title: Duk Abin Da Kake Bukata Don Kasuwanci Cikin Nasara
features.subtitle: An gina musamman don manoma da masu saye na Afirka, tare da fasaloli da ke aiki ko a wuraren da haɗin Intanet yake ƙasa.

smartSearch.title: Bincike Mai Hankali & Matattara
smartSearch.desc: Sami daidai abin da kake bukata ta hanyar bincike na ci gaba bisa nau'in kayan gona, wuri, adadi, da kewayon farashi.

escrow.title: Asusun Tsaka-Tsakin Fasahar Lantarki
escrow.desc: Kudin ana adanawa a cikin kwangila mai hankali mai aminci kuma za a saki su ne kawai lokacin da ka tabbatar da kayan.

locationMatching.title: Haɗa Bisa Wuri
locationMatching.desc: Haɗu da manoma da masu siye a yankinku don rage kuɗin sufuri da tabbatar da ƙwanciyar sabo.

smsAlerts.title: Gargadi ta SMS na Lokaci-Lokaci
smsAlerts.desc: Samu sanarwa nan take game da sabbin odar, canje-canjen farashi, da tambayoyin masu saye kai tsaye zuwa wayarka.

priceTransparency.title: Bayyanar Farashin Kasuwa
priceTransparency.desc: Samu farashin kasuwa na ainihi a lokacin don yanke shawara mai kyau da kuma tattauna yarjejeniyoyi na adalci.

verifiedUsers.title: Masu Amintattu
verifiedUsers.desc: Kasuwanci cikin tabbaci, ka san duk masu amfani an tabbatar da sahihanci da amincinsu.

mobileFirst.title: Zane Na Farko Na Wayar Salula
mobileFirst.desc: Samun dama zuwa dandalin daga kowanne na'ura, an tsara shi musamman don masu amfani da wayar hannu masu iyakacin haɗin intanet.

howItWorks.title: Yadda FarmLink Ke Aiki
howItWorks.subtitle: Mai sauƙi, kai tsaye, kuma an tsara shi don kowa - daga masu sayen kayan fasaha masu wayo zuwa manoma masu wayoyin salula na asali.

createAccount.title: Ƙirƙiri Asusunka
createAccount.desc: Yi rajista a matsayin manomi ko mai saye cikin 'yan mintoci. Tabbatar da ainihinka don fara kasuwanci.

listProduce.title: Jera ko Bincika Kayayyaki
listProduce.desc: Manoma suna wallafa kayan gona da suke da su. Masu saye suna bincike da tacewa don samun abin da suke bukata.

connect.title: Haɗa & Sassauta
connect.desc: Ku tuntubi juna kai tsaye ta dandalin. Ku tattauna farashi da adadi.

getUpdates.title: Samu Sabuntawa ta SMS
getUpdates.desc: Karɓi sanarwar SMS nan take don odar, tambayoyi, da sabuntawar farashi.

problem.title: Manoma na Asarar Kudi Kowace Rana

card1.title: Asarar Bayan Girbi
card1.desc: Kashi 30-40% na amfanin gona yana lalacewa saboda rashin samun kasuwa da rashin ingantattun wuraren ajiya.

card2.title: Cin Hanci da Rashin Gaskiya na Masu Tsaka Tsaki
card2.desc: Manoma suna samun ƙananan kaso kawai na farashin ƙarshe na sayarwa yayin da masu shiga tsakani ke ɗaukar mafi yawan sa.

card3.title: Babu Bayanin Kasuwa
card3.desc: Rashin samun bayanan farashi na ainihi yana barin manoma cikin haɗari wajen ciniki marar adalci.

card4.title: Sauyin Yanayi
card4.desc: Ruwan sama maras tabbas da fari na bazata na nufin lokutan shuka na gargajiya kamar wasa ne, wanda ke haifar da asarar amfanin gona gaba ɗaya.

card5.title: Kwari da Cutar Amfanin gona
card5.desc: Sabuwar kwari ko cuta na iya hallaka gonaki gaba ɗaya cikin awanni 48, ba tare da ƙwararre don neman taimako ba.

solution.title: Samun Kai Tsaye Zuwa Kasuwa & Mataimakin AI

card1.title: Haɗin Kai Tsaye
card1.desc: Haɗa manoma kai tsaye da masu saye, cire dillalai da tabbatar da farashi mai adalci ga dukkan bangarorin.

card2.title: Farashin Bayyananne
card2.desc: Farashin kasuwa na ainihi da kowa zai iya gani, yana tabbatar da ciniki nagari da yanke shawara bisa sani.

card3.title: Sanarwar SMS
card3.desc: Saƙonnin SMS nan take don sabbin odar, sabuntar farashi, da tambayoyin masu siye - ba a buƙatar intanet.

card4.title: Shawarar Noman AI
card4.desc: Abokin tuki namu yana nazarin bayanan yanayi da hasashen yanayi don gaya maka *makon da ya fi dacewa* daidaiku don shuka amfanin gona.

card5.title: Na'urar Gano Cutar Nan Take
card5.desc: Kawai ɗauki hoton ganye mai rashin lafiya, kuma AI ɗinmu zai gane cutar nan take kuma ya ba ka zaɓuɓɓukan magani masu rahusa.
